Episodes.Title: Go Big or Go Home
Episodes.Plot: Leslie and the Parks Department return to work after three months to discover that the budget crisis still looms. After unsuccessfully trying to have their budget restored by using Ann to charm Chris with a date, Leslie decides to make an all or nothing play by resurrecting the Pawnee Harvest Festival. Meanwhile, Ben restarts the youth basketball league and instates Ron and Andy to coach the only two teams. April returns from a vacation with a new boyfriend.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Flu Season
Episodes.Plot: While planning for the local Harvest Festival, Leslie is struck with the flu and is forced to go to the hospital. Ron and Andy have a day of male bonding, and Tom hits the spa.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Time Capsule
Episodes.Plot: Leslie wants to bury a time capsule that encapsulates life in Pawnee, but an odd suggestion from a local man causes unforeseen consequences. Andy seeks help from Chris about how to win back April.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Will Forte, Natalie Morales, Jama Williamson, Alison Becker, Darlene Hunt

Episodes.Title: Ron and Tammy II
Episodes.Plot: Tom tries to get back at Ron by going out on a date with Ron's ex-wife Tammy, while Leslie tries to protect Ron from falling prey to her charms. Meanwhile, April is assigned to work with Chris.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Megan Mullally, Jama Williamson, Eric Pierpoint

Episodes.Title: Media Blitz
Episodes.Plot: While advertising for the Harvest Festival, Ben has to deal with some troubling questions about his past. Meanwhile, Andy continues to try to win April back.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Mo Collins, Alison Becker, Matt Besser, Nick Kroll

Episodes.Title: Indianapolis
Episodes.Plot: Ron and Leslie take a road trip to the big city in order to visit Ron's favorite place which happens to be a steakhouse, but Leslie has alternative motives for the trip.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Harvest Festival
Episodes.Plot: It's make it or break it for the Parks Department at the Harvest Festival which is full of surprises.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Mo Collins, Jonathan Joss, Joey Russo

Episodes.Title: Camping
Episodes.Plot: Leslie takes the whole department camping in order to brainstorm new ideas. Meanwhile, Andy attempts a romantic gesture for April, while Ann gets nervous when Chris returns to Pawnee as the new city manager.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Andy and April's Fancy Party
Episodes.Plot: April and Andy host a dinner party for the Parks Department. Meanwhile, Ann tries to move on from Chris at a singles' party.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: John Ellison Conlee, Terri Hoyos, Ben Schwartz

Episodes.Title: Soulmates
Episodes.Plot: Leslie tries an online dating service, but doesn't end up with a stranger as she expects. Also, Chris challenges Ron to a grilling competition as part of his plans to make Pawnee healthier.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Jerry's Painting
Episodes.Plot: Jerry?s contribution to Leslie?s community art show causes a stir. Ben moves in with April and Andy and attempts to teach them how to be adults. Meanwhile, Leslie is frustrated by Chris and his interoffice dating rules.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jay Jackson, Darlene Hunt, Mara Marini

Episodes.Title: Eagleton
Episodes.Plot: Leslie's ex-best friend, Lindsay Carlisle Shay, launches an attack on Pawnee, banning residents from visiting a nearby park in the neighboring city of Eagleton with a large fence, causing Leslie to go to war with Eagleton. Meanwhile, everyone finds out that it is Ron's birthday, a fact that he went to extreme lengths to conceal.

Episodes.Title: The Fight
Episodes.Plot: When Leslie tries to get Ann a job at city hall, her lukewarm reaction causes their first-ever fight. Tom invites the entire department to the Snakehole Lounge to help him promote his new alcohol, "Snake Juice."
Episodes.GuestStars: Nick Kroll, Andy Milder, Ben Schwartz, Matt Besser

Episodes.Title: Road Trip
Episodes.Plot: When Chris sends Leslie and Ben on a trip to Indianapolis, Leslie is afraid she won't be able to deny her feelings for him. Ron teaches a young student about his views on government. Meanwhile, Andy gets his feelings hurt by April after playing Tom's new game.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kirk Fox, Jessica St. Clair, Jay Jackson, Alyssa Shafer

Episodes.Title: The Bubble
Episodes.Plot: Everyone in the office is unhappy when Chris decides to make some big changes in the parks department -- especially Tom who starts to question his career choices. Leslie is caught off guard when Ben has a meeting with her mom.

Episodes.Title: Li'l Sebastian
Episodes.Plot: Leslie and the parks team put together a memorial service for a dearly departed friend. Meanwhile, Tom makes a big life decision, while Chris reacts badly to a health problem.
Episodes.GuestStars: Megan Mullally, Ben Schwartz, Johnny Sneed, Detlef Schrempf
